p: Positive HPV samples were screened for HPV genotypes using EUROArray HPV kit (Euroimmun, New Jersey, USA). The kit includes amplification and hybridization steps that identify 30 different HR and LR HPV types. The kit is based on the amplification of E6 and E7 viral oncogenes fragments and their detection via hybridization with immobilized DNA probes [ 16, 17].
